-MSgyQMjBNfYjW2m6r97.name: 4WD
-MSgyQMjBNfYjW2m6r97.description: Four-wheel drive, also called 4x4 (four by four) or 4WD, refers to a two-axled vehicle drivetrain capable of providing torque to all of its wheels simultaneously.

-MSgySbWEFw3rhCfIIns.name: Airbag
-MSgySbWEFw3rhCfIIns.description: An Airbag is a vehicle occupant-restraint system using a bag designed to inflate extremely quickly, then quickly deflate during a collision.

-MSgyUeUxLUNUorksrlq.name: Air conditioning
-MSgyUeUxLUNUorksrlq.description: Air conditioning, [abbreviated A/C (US) or air con (UK)] is a technique that provide heating, ventilation, and air conditioning (HVAC).

-MSgyWOlRpJq2G2hBqYZ.name: Alloy wheels
-MSgyWOlRpJq2G2hBqYZ.description: Alloy wheels, often are purchased for cosmetic purposes.

-MSgyY8fK5DetuiWvbbX.name: Bluetooth
-MSgyY8fK5DetuiWvbbX.description: Bluetooth car stereo typically allows you to connect your phone, a wireless earpiece or headphones, and other portable electronics.

-MSgyZoHC-v0eEdoy31Y.name: CD
-MSgyZoHC-v0eEdoy31Y.description: Compact disc changer is device that allows you to listen CDs on car audio system.

-MSgyacRSWOAMXra4lZ_.name: Cruise control
-MSgyacRSWOAMXra4lZ_.description: Cruise control (also known as speed control, autocruise, or tempomat) is a system that automatically controls the speed of an automobile.

-MSgycIUgNg2qojbj7e1.name: LED
-MSgycIUgNg2qojbj7e1.description: The advantages of LED lights are many: brighter light, better quality of light, less prone to breakage and less energy consumption.

-MSgydt2l0elQZ2vWXtL.name: Navigation
-MSgydt2l0elQZ2vWXtL.description: An electronic system in a vehicle that provides a real-time map of the current location and step-by-step directions to a requested destination.

-MSgyg1jo4ZATbbeLtCF.name: Seat heating
-MSgyg1jo4ZATbbeLtCF.description: Seat heating is a systems that uses heating elements to warm the seats.

-MSgyhugLG4gmph9qIGB.name: Keyless
-MSgyhugLG4gmph9qIGB.description: Keyless system allows you to unlock your car automatically and start and stop it at the push of a button, offering drivers increased convenience, safety, and security.

-MSgyl1Umh0tKd3ISkJt.name: Parking Assist
-MSgyl1Umh0tKd3ISkJt.description: Park Assist is an automated parking aid that helps drivers park with greater precision, using guidance system technology.

-MSgymXYyAU71cDX6-eK.name: Rain Sensor
-MSgymXYyAU71cDX6-eK.description: Rain sensor is a driver-assistance system that detects water on a car's windscreen and activates wipers in the rain.

-MSgyo88wO16izQZCVjh.name: USB
-MSgyo88wO16izQZCVjh.description: A car USB socket is used to power or enable portable devices to work in a car.
